name: Jibier's Adventure - Valentine's Curse
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 46  - Theme : "Keep it alive"

## Description

A 2D game where you play the famous character Jibier and have to protect your lover Valentine from the forces of Evil led by Vô the Prince of Doom and break Valentine's Curse.

Game made on [Construct 2](https://www.scirra.com/store/construct-2).

## Team
- Jibier : Main Programming, Graphism, Main Game Design
- Jean : Sound Design, Assist Programming, Assist Game Design
- Vô : Sprites and Animations

## Disclaimer
Freely inspired by the Castlevania Franchise.

Music from Castlevania 3 : Dracula's Curse, remastered by [8-BitStereo](https://www.youtube.com/user/Wiiguy309/).
